page.title: 14PLAYGROUND GAMES IN GROBY.
page.content: {'LAGGY'}played by girls has two facing each other about 2 metres apart,with a continuous piece of elastic round their ankles.A third person stands between the strands of elastic and has then to jump and try to alternately land on and then avoid landing on the elastic which stretches between the end players{(enders)}.If this is successful then the elastic is slipped further up the leg thus making landing on it more difficult.{'HOT SOFTBALL'}- played by boys and girls involves two teams.There is a batting side and a fielding side.A bowler bowls a soft ball and the batsman has to hit it and run to a safe place at the other end of the pitch.A batsman is out if caught,or hit by the ball while running or when the ball goes behind him.The batsmen have to try and get back to the batting place.
